author: vors
body:
We may want to reflect this layout in SD to make mapping trivial.

Few key points from the offline discussion:
1. We organize things so sources for one Module (i.e. .cs and .psd1) leave together
2. We want a flat structure for the most part, but not everywhere (i.e. SMA is too big to be a single flat folder).
title: Find the right layout for files
